values: 课程；讲座；过程；进程；经过；道路；（船或飞机的）航向；航线；（砖、石等墙的）层；跑马场；比赛场地；疗程；系列；连续；河道；方针；总方向；一道菜；行动方式；处理方式

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 追赶；奔驰；携带猎犬狩猎
跑过；追逐；指引航线（course的ing形式）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指在一段时间内教完或学完的完整的课程。
主要指教材中的一课或每次授课的单位时间。
从“班级”引申指学生在一起上课，还可表示“(一节)课”。

word_group.brief_definition: (强调不同意)当然不, 当然没有, 当然不是
偏离航向；偏航；偏离方向
培训班；训练课程；实习课
在适当的时候, 到一定的时候

bilingual.source: Have you ever taken a summer course?
You are certain to learn a lot from the course.
bilingual.target: 你一定会从课程中学到很多。

bilingual.source: This course can help you develop your speaking skills.
bilingual.target: 这门课程可以帮助你提高口头表达能力。

bilingual.source: The course entertains young learners through fun stories.
bilingual.target: 该课程通过有趣的故事娱乐年轻学习者。

bilingual.source: Wonderful World is a six-level English course for young learners.
bilingual.target: 《奇妙世界》是一个六级的英语课程。

bilingual.source: The course also uses spectacular National Geographic photography.
bilingual.target: 该课程还使用了壮观的国家地理摄影作品。

bilingual.source: You must pay for your course at least one month before it starts.
bilingual.target: 你必须在课程开始前至少一个月支付课程费用。

bilingual.source: The course was great and so was my presentation, thanks to him!
bilingual.target: 课程很棒，我的演讲也很棒，多亏了他！

bilingual.source: For many of our students this is the best part of the course.
bilingual.target: 对于我们的许多学生来说，这是课程中最好的部分。

list.abstract: course，英文单词，可用作名词、动词，译为课程、航线、快速移动等。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you kidding? He made me sign a waiver, participate in an emergency fire drill and take a refresher course in CPR. Thank God he had a dummy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么可能不知道，他逼我签了免责书，参加了紧急消防演习，还复习了心脏复苏术的课程，还好他有个人体模型。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course. Of course you didn't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，你当然不是故意的。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, of course. Of course. So, what's the play?
Thank you, Ben. Of course.
Of course. Come in. Come in.
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: Of course, results may vary.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，效果可能因人而异。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course, with my apologies.
Of course, it's your friend Tanya.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然是你们的朋友塔尼亚。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course I did, but, well... Go on.
Of course, if that's what you prefer.
I'm sorry. Yes, of course. Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉，我会好好振作的。谢了。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course not. You just repair drones.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然没有了。你只是个无人机修理工。

yingyinNormal.en: No, no, no, of course not. It's, a lot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，当然不会，只...只是... 只是，我一下难以接受。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course, you probably know the answer.
Mummy, can I stir? Yes, of course Peppa.
yingyinNormal.zh: 妈妈，我能搅拌吗？是的，当然可以佩佩。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course. What seems to be the trouble?
Of course they are. Leonard's being one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然有，莱纳德就是一个。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course, you probably know the answer.
You couldn't sleep either? Of course not.
Of course, you want me to track her down.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a series of lectures or lessons in a particular subject, typically leading to a qualification

examination_example.sentence: But another, related force — a policy often buried deep in <highlight>course</highlight> catalogs called "grade forgiveness" — is helping raise GPAs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是另一种相关的力量——一种经常被深埋在课程目录中的政策，叫做“分数宽恕”——正在帮助提高平均绩点。

examination_example.sentence: So I decided to look for some fashion-related <highlight>courses</highlight> that included writing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我决定找一些与时尚相关的课程，包括写作。

examination_example.sentence: Two years before graduating from secondary school, I took a sewing and design <highlight>course</highlight> thinking that I would move on to a fashion design <highlight>course</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中学毕业前两年，我修了一门缝纫和设计课程，以为自己会转到时装设计课程。

examination_example.sentence: Of <highlight>course</highlight>, it is not like you can take an unemployed waiter and train him to be a doctor in a few weeks, no matter who pays for it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，不管谁出钱，你也不可能在几周内把一个失业的服务员训练成医生。

examination_example.sentence: Being a good parent is, of <highlight>course</highlight>, what every parent would like to be.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，每个父母都想成为一个好父母。

examination_example.sentence: In the popular imagination, of <highlight>course</highlight>, guilt still gets a bad rap.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，在大众的想象中，负罪感仍然会受到不好的评价。

examination_example.sentence: This generation, due to the pressures of technology, will work for 17 different employers over the <highlight>course</highlight> of their working life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于技术的压力，这一代人将在他们的职业生涯中为17个不同的雇主工作。

examination_example.sentence: Before it ends, it will likely change the life <highlight>course</highlight> and character of a generation of young adults.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在它结束之前，它可能会改变一代年轻人的生活进程和性格。

sense_info_list.en: any of the separate parts of a meal

examination_example.sentence: It is more than enough for a three-<highlight>course</highlight> lunch at Michelin-starred Arbutus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在米其林星级餐厅Arbutus吃一顿三道菜的午餐绰绰有余。

sense_info_list.en: the route or direction followed by a ship, aircraft, road, or river

examination_example.sentence: Sometimes storms blew the vessels far off their <highlight>course</highlight>, and often calm brought unbearably long delay.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时暴风雨会把船只吹离航线，而平静往往会带来难以忍受的长时间的延误。

sense_info_list.en: an area of land set aside and prepared for racing, golf, or another sport
pursue (game, especially hares) with greyhounds using sight rather than scent

sample.mean: n. 话语；交谈；辩论；语篇；谈话；正式讨论；语段
n. 求助的对象；方法；手段；追索权；求助于；诉诸；求偿权

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 常指溪流、天体等自然形成的轨道。
指各种道路，有时指大道，用途最广。
常指较远的路线，可能包括若干段路程。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 航道; 河道; 路线

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a series of lectures or lessons in a particular subject, typically leading to a qualification

examination_example.sentence: Advanced algebra and other higher-level math should be cut from curricula in favor of <highlight>courses</highlight> with more routine usefulness, like statistics.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 高等代数和其他高阶数学应该从课程中削减，转而选择更常规有用的课程，比如统计学。

examination_example.sentence: Such <highlight>courses</highlight> are a remedy for the numerical illiteracy of adults who are unable to calculate the price of a carpet by area.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样的课程是对那些无法计算地毯面积价格的成年人的数字盲的一种补救。

examination_example.sentence: It's important to note that robotic nurses don't decide <highlight>courses</highlight> of treatment or make diagnoses (though robot doctors and surgeons may not be far off).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 需要注意的是，机器人护士并不能决定治疗方案或做出诊断（虽然机器人医生和外科医生可能离我们不远了）。

examination_example.sentence: Decision fatigue assuredly leads to inaction and the possible chagrin (懊恼) of a decision maker who might otherwise prefer a new <highlight>course</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 决策疲劳肯定会导致无所作为，还可能会使决策者感到懊恼，否则他们可能更喜欢新的方法。

examination_example.sentence: Our own decision-making abilities can become depleted over the <highlight>course</highlight> of the day causing indecision or poor choices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们自己的决策能力可能会在一天中耗尽，导致优柔寡断或糟糕的选择。

examination_example.sentence: Since a change in the <highlight>course</highlight> of action can sometimes be important and lead to a positive outcome.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为行动过程中的改变有时是重要的，能带来积极的结果。

examination_example.sentence: You end up repeating the ideas you're hoping people will forget—but, of <highlight>course</highlight>, people can't forget them because you keep talking about them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你最终会重复那些你希望人们会忘记的想法——但是，当然，人们不会忘记它们，因为你一直在谈论它们。

examination_example.sentence: And of <highlight>course</highlight>, managers shouldn't keep resending emails.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，经理们不应该一直不停发送邮件。

examination_example.sentence: The IQ of the children in the two musical groups rose by an average of seven points in the <highlight>course</highlight> of a year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一年的时间里，这两个音乐团的孩子们的智商平均提高了7分。

sense_info_list.en: the route or direction followed by a ship, aircraft, road, or river
sense_info_list.zh: 航道; 河道; 路线

sample.mean: n. 话语；交谈；辩论；语篇；谈话；正式讨论；语段
n. 求助的对象；方法；手段；追索权；求助于；诉诸；求偿权

word_usage.usage:
- in the course of...(在…的过程中) 是状语短语。
- in course of...(正在…中) 是形容词短语。
course in... 表示“...学科的课程”。
of course的意思是“当然，自然”，可放在句首、句中、句尾，指预料必然发生而不费力的事，常用逗号和主句隔开。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 可指班级或全体学生, 如class 5, 也可从"班级"引申指学生在一起上课, 还可表示"(一节)课"。
课程(可包括多门科目); 指在一段时间内教完或学完的完整的课程。
(尤指面向学生的)讲座,课, 教训,训斥,斥责, (常指在大学里)讲课,讲授, 教训,训斥,斥责。
主要指教材中的一课或每次授课的单位时间。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 航道; 河道; 路线

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a series of lectures or lessons in a particular subject; typically leading to a qualification

examination_example.sentence: One online <highlight>course</highlight> provider I use asks you what you think of the <highlight>course</highlight> after you've only completed roughly 2 percent of it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我使用的一个在线课程提供商会问你，在你只完成了大约2%的课程后，你对这个课程有什么看法。

examination_example.sentence: But really, you just have a <highlight>course</highlight> leader, who is there, sort of, as a coaching guide and to help out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但实际上，你只有一个课程负责人，他就在那里，某种程度上，提供指导和帮助。

examination_example.sentence: It's like a <highlight>course</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就像一门课程。

examination_example.sentence: Large surveys conducted over the <highlight>course</highlight> of many years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 多年以来的大规模调查。

examination_example.sentence: He recalled a recent paper he submitted to a journal, which accepted it, and then reversed <highlight>course</highlight> and rejected it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他回忆起他最近提交给一家杂志的一篇论文，该期刊接受了这篇论文，然后又改口拒绝了它。

examination_example.sentence: One simple check would be to program a robot to check the correct <highlight>course</highlight> of action with a human.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一种简单的检查方法是给机器人编写程序，让它与人类一起检查正确的进展过程。

sense_info_list.en: any of the separate parts of a meal

examination_example.sentence: Around 1804, Talleyrand challenged Carmela to produce a full menu for his personal castle, instructing the young baker to use local, seasonal fruits and vegetables and to avoid repeating main dishes over the <highlight>course</highlight> of an entire year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1804年左右，Talleyrand给了Carmela一个挑战，为他的个人城堡制作一份完整的菜单，指示这名年轻的面包师使用当地的时令水果和蔬菜，并避免在一整年中重复主菜。

examination_example.sentence: For a banquet celebrating the Grand Duke Nicholas of Russia's visit to George IV's Brighton Pavilion on Jan. 18, 1817, the menu featured 120 different dishes, highlighting eight different soups, 40 main <highlight>courses</highlight>, and 32 desserts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1817年1月18日，为庆祝俄国大公尼古拉斯访问乔治四世的 Brington Pavilion 举行的宴会，菜单上共提供120种菜肴，其中包括8种不同的汤，40种主菜和32种甜点。

examination_example.sentence: These sauces-bechamel, velour, espagnole and allemnande-formed the central building blocks for many French main <highlight>courses</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些调味料(调味酱，丝绒，西班牙奶油和蒜蓉酱)构成了许多法国主菜的核心组成部分。

sense_info_list.en: an area of land set aside and prepared for racing; golf; or another sport
the route or direction followed by a ship; aircraft; road; or river
sense_info_list.zh: 航道; 河道; 路线

sample.mean: n. 话语；交谈；辩论；语篇；谈话；正式讨论；语段
n. 求助的对象；方法；手段；追索权；求助于；诉诸；求偿权

word_usage.usage:
- in the course of...(在…的过程中) 是状语短语。
- in course of...(正在…中) 是形容词短语。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 可指班级或全体学生，如class 5，也可从"班级"引申指学生在一起上课，还可表示"(一节)课"。
课程(可包括多门科目); 指在一段时间内教完或学完的完整的课程。
(尤指面向学生的)讲座,课，教训,训斥,斥责，(常指在大学里)讲课,讲授，教训,训斥,斥责。
主要指教材中的一课或每次授课的单位时间。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a series of lectures or lessons in a particular subject, typically leading to a qualification

examination_example.sentence: If there is truly a concern about a professor's professionalism, be sure to use online <highlight>course</highlight> evaluations to calmly offer your comments.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果真的担心教授的专业水平，一定要使用在线课程评估冷静地提出你的意见。

examination_example.sentence: Before asking questions about the <highlight>course</highlight> design, read the syllabus and learning management system information.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在询问有关课程设计的问题之前，请阅读教学大纲和学习管理系统信息。

examination_example.sentence: He took the same <highlight>course</highlight> last year, and I remember he owns a copy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他去年上了同样的课，我记得他有一本。

examination_example.sentence: Of <highlight>course</highlight>, if you are a non-human species, collapse is well underway.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，如果你是非人类物种，崩塌正在全面进行中。

examination_example.sentence: This, of <highlight>course</highlight>, can lead to less pain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，这可以导致更少的痛苦。

sense_info_list.en: the route or direction followed by a ship, aircraft, road, or river

sample.mean: n. 话语；交谈；辩论；语篇；谈话；正式讨论；语段
n. 求助的对象；方法；手段；追索权；求助于；诉诸；求偿权

word_usage.usage:
in the course of...(在…的过程中) 是状语短语。
in course of...(正在…中) 是形容词短语。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 可指班级或全体学生，如class 5，也可从"班级"引申指学生在一起上课，还可表示"（一节）课"。
课程（可包括多门科目）；指在一段时间内教完或学完的完整的课程。
（尤指面向学生的）讲座，课，教训，训斥，斥责，（常指在大学里）讲课，讲授，教训，训斥，斥责。
主要指教材中的一课或每次授课的单位时间。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 航道; 河道; 路线

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 偏离航向；偏航；偏离方向
培训班；训练课程；实习课

examination_example.sentence: Of <highlight>course</highlight> one tower and a few bikes won't solve China's air pollution problem.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，一座塔和几辆自行车解决不了中国的空气污染问题。

examination_example.sentence: Just as I thought, my dear, but of <highlight>course</highlight> I had to make sure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如我所想的，亲爱的，但当然我必须确定。

examination_example.sentence: "Of <highlight>course</highlight>," he answered.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “当然，”他回答。

sense_info_list.en: a series of lectures or lessons in a particular subject, typically leading to a qualification

examination_example.sentence: Ben wishes to take an online <highlight>course</highlight> on Tuesdays.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 本希望在星期二上在线课程。

examination_example.sentence: Though taking care of her grandmother takes her lots of energy, Sally has tried to stay on top of all her <highlight>courses</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管照顾祖母耗费了她大量的精力，但萨莉还是尽力在所有课程中名列前茅。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>course</highlight> lasts continuously for five months.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 课程持续五个月。

sense_info_list.en: an area of land set aside and prepared for racing, golf, or another sport

examination_example.sentence: Building a golf <highlight>course</highlight> and maintaining (维护) it costs a lot of money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 建造一个高尔夫球场并且维护它，需要花费很多钱。

examination_example.sentence: If you turn the park into a golf <highlight>course</highlight>, these kids won't have anywhere to go and they won't have anything to do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你把公园变成高尔夫球场，这些孩子将无处可去，他们也将无事可做。

examination_example.sentence: That means that the golf <highlight>course</highlight> will only be available to people with lots of money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这意味着高尔夫球场只对有钱人开放。

sense_info_list.en: any of the separate parts of a meal

examination_example.sentence: What will they share for the main <highlight>course</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们会共享什么主菜？

examination_example.sentence: Main <highlight>courses</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 主食

sense_info_list.en: the route or direction followed by a ship, aircraft, road, or river
sense_info_list.zh: 航道; 河道; 路线

examination_example.sentence: Because they go off <highlight>course</highlight> in testing and scoring.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为他们在测试和评分上偏离了轨道。

sample.mean: n. 话语；交谈；辩论；语篇；谈话；正式讨论；语段
n. 求助的对象；方法；手段；追索权；求助于；诉诸；求偿权

word_usage.usage: course in... 表示“...学科的课程”。
of course的意思是“当然，自然”，可放在句首、句中、句尾，指预料必然发生而不费力的事，常用逗号和主句隔开。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 从"班级"引申指学生在一起上课，也指某一科目的课程。
指学习某种技能的课程，也指学校里的一堂课或课本中的某一课。
指有关某一学科的系列课程，也指大学中为修读学位或取得某种资格而学习的课程。
